title: Error on Path Provided
body:
HELP!!! I need help on the path provided error. I had just downloaded the game and now it's almost like it was just a waste of space. Nothing. Always saying Error : The system cannot find the path specified. 
I went to the Lol files and found the Error that was popping up there also. 
Is there something I have to put in? 
Something I have to type in manually? 
Or maybe have something installed to fix it? 
Please HELP!!!
:*(

replies.body:
I've never heard of this error before, but I suspect this may be caused by a bad shortcut. I'd recommend launching League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file inside your installation directory (should be in **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**) to ensure you're launching it correctly.

Let me know if this caused any change. If not, [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of the error you're seeing for me.
have you tried uninstalling the client and then installing it again? sometimes the file gets corrupted when downloaded so it looks ok but doesnt preform the same
